audioText: Cette haine prodigieusement profonde a retiré toute joie de sa vie quotidienne.
question: What has the deep hatred done to his life?
options: Removed all joy from his daily life
Brought unexpected happiness to his routine
explanation: The text states 'Cette haine prodigieusement profonde a retiré toute joie de sa vie quotidienne' - This prodigiously deep hatred has removed all joy from his daily life. The noun 'haine' (hatred) with adverb 'prodigieusement' (prodigiously) and verb 'retiré' (removed) describe emotional devastation.
